main event: A report from October 1957 describes a missile-appearing object with Russian markings observed on Angulus Crest Hwy, California.
interesting points: The object was classified as a hoax based on its lack of maneuverability and unknown characteristics., The object had Russian writings on it., A witness, Mr. John Smith, observed a large triangular craft hovering silently above the highway., The local authorities were notified of the sighting, which was then reported to the USAF., A detailed analysis concluded that the object was built locally and not an aircraft.
witness description: The witness described the object as a large, triangular craft, and another report mentions seeing a missile-appearing object.
